component.name: Scan Tailor Experimental
component.summary: Scan Tailor Experimental is an interactive post-processing tool for scanned pages.

description.p:
Scan Tailor Experimental is an interactive post-processing tool for scanned pages. It performs operations such as:
page splitting,
deskewing,
adding/removing borders,
selecting content
... and others.
You give it raw scans, and you get pages ready to be printed or assembled into a PDF or DJVU file. Scanning, optical character recognition, and assembling multi-page documents are out of scope of this project.

Scan Tailor Experimental is Free Software (which is more than just freeware). It's written in C++ with Qt and released under the General Public License version 3. We develop both Windows and GNU/Linux versions.
